title: Live Cell Imager
cleaned_text: Additional Navigation Close Live Cell Imager [https://www.brownbearsw.com/freecal/LiveCellImager](https://www.brownbearsw.com/freecal/LiveCellImager) - Fully motorized with two freely configurable key rings, TFT display on the stand or in the docking station light manager and contrast manager Incubation Chamber Temperature regulation Optics - High-performance 10x, 20x and 63x objectives for different tasks involved in Live Cell Imaging, with special LCI and thermally-insulated objectives Optimized Differential Interference Contrast for homogeneous illumination across the entire field of view Fluorescence - Apochromatic correction for optimum imaging of all wavelengths Versatile illumination spectrum from the self-adjusting HBO to the high-speed light source Apotome - Glare free and 3D imaging of thick samples and tissue sections
